channel.title: Extinction version 3!
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape!
Devourz here!, Id like to introduce you all to Extinction version 3!
As you may know i owned the previous extinction version 2 with 2 other friends!
This time I have decided to go solo on this, I created this entire project myself
There will be no co-owner for I have done everything myself, I have spent countless hours on this server and i hope it gets very far!
What Version 3 has to offer:
New to version 3: * 30+ customs including Drygores + Off-hands * 25+ New 100% working bosses * New Zombies minigame * New skilling, Pvm, Pvp areas * New Super Donator Zone * New Donator zone * Rare drop table yells - [NEWS] Devourz has received a "Divine sigil" as a rare drop * Goliath, Swift, Spellcastor gloves + there specials now work! * Player logins - Whenever someone logs in yell says "Player devourz has logged in. * Miasmic spells now work! * Custom setyells now work, Ingame ::title now works with custom colouring * New shops
PVP - Added new bosses to wildy to keep the wild more active, Added miasmic spells too.
PVM - Added new things such as pvm kill count to keep track of how many bosses you have slain in total!
Skilling – Exp rates have been nerfed slightly due to massive xp amounts while skilling.
------------------------------------------------------ Server features:
* 24/7 Global Friends chat "Help" * Regular Updates * dedicated owner * Fast money making! * Fast leveling! * Comp/Max cape! * Jad 1 wave * All nex sets (Torva/Pernix/Virtus) * All chaotics! * Primal armour + Weapons! * Kiln cape (Tokhaar - kal) * Korasi sword! With 100% working spec! * Flawless Pvp - Perfect switching 100% hybridding! * Crystal keys for our amazing Ckey Treasure box! * Unique new home! (Under Construction) * Great skilling areas! * All 24 skills working! - With our own unique dungeoneering! * Donator zone! - (Extreme Donator zone Coming soon)! * Amazing donator benefits * Barrows brothers on hills! * All minigames - Barrows/Dominion tower/Castle wars/Duel arena. * Funpk zone! - Clanwars! - Safe portal (White) Unsafe portal (Red)! * Highscores! Coming soon!
-------------------------------------------------------- Server NPC:
*Nex *All GWD *Corp + Custom corporeal beast *Bal'lak *Slash bash *Balanced elemental *Mutant tarn *Blink *Zemouregal *Ulfric *Ice demon *Ice Troll King *General Khazard *Jungle demon *Merc mage *Necro lord *Sunfreet *King Black Dragon *Queen Black Dragon *Tormented demons *Jad - 1 Wave. *Bork *Kalphite Queen *Nomad *Troll Queen *DKS - Dagannoth Kings *Glacors *Jadinkos *Polypore *Ganodermic Beasts *Avatar Of Destruction *Chaos Elemental *Revs *Giant Mole *Kal'ger The Warmonger *Glod *Wildy Wyrm *Ice strykewyrms *World-Gorger *Lucien *Phoenix *Do No Evil Bosses *Enhanced Ice Titans *Bouncer
*Lunar bosses: The Inadequacy The Everlasting The Untouchable
Much more! ----------------------------------------------------------- MEDIA: --------------------------------------------------- 1. Some of our Customs [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C33Ioay.png[/img] 2. Goliath gloves and Swift gloves + Specs, Miasmic spells [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HJwt9Ui.png[/img] 3. Some shops [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gqdTBNl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IP69daH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9xQjK9O.png[/img] 4. Some Npc bosses. NOTE - There is lots more will upload them later! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OamUUp2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LvVP6yk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3w1gqiT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2pfBx8S.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DAAgbo2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/61k7Lcz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0dMpipP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aYSuS1o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jgO29dZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zw4zznO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5duDWeQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UswCs9H.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mdN9YMH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m2XamCm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oK7R3lr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QaHTc31.png[/img] 5. Working bank tabs. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vHcTFGY.png[/img] 6.Home + Shopes, That home is only temporary. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Jw6dkTW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wAa26Og.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Download link:[/size] https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/249954846/Extinction.jar https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/...Extinction.jar
Hope to see you ingame :D Opened date - 17/3/14

item.title: Extinction version 3!
item.dc:creator: @pkonlynoob pkonlynoob
item.description:
@pkonlynoob wrote:

Hello Moparscape!

Devourz here!, Id like to introduce you all to Extinction version 3!

As you may know i owned the previous extinction version 2 with 2 other friends!

This time I have decided to go solo on this, I created this entire project myself

There will be no co-owner for I have done everything myself, I have spent countless hours on this server and i hope it gets very far!

What Version 3 has to offer:

New to version 3:

  • 30+ customs including Drygores + Off-hands
  • 25+ New 100% working bosses
  • New Zombies minigame
  • New skilling, Pvm, Pvp areas
  • New Super Donator Zone
  • New Donator zone
  • Rare drop table yells - [NEWS] Devourz has received a “Divine sigil” as a rare drop
  • Goliath, Swift, Spellcastor gloves + there specials now work!
  • Player logins - Whenever someone logs in yell says "Player devourz has logged in.
  • Miasmic spells now work!
  • Custom setyells now work, Ingame ::title now works with custom colouring
  • New shops

PVP - Added new bosses to wildy to keep the wild more active, Added miasmic spells too.

PVM - Added new things such as pvm kill count to keep track of how many bosses you have slain in total!

Skilling – Exp rates have been nerfed slightly due to massive xp amounts while skilling.

Server features:

  • 24/7 Global Friends chat “Help”
  • Regular Updates
  • dedicated owner
  • Fast money making!
  • Fast leveling!
  • Comp/Max cape!
  • Jad 1 wave
  • All nex sets (Torva/Pernix/Virtus)
  • All chaotics!
  • Primal armour + Weapons!
  • Kiln cape (Tokhaar - kal)
  • Korasi sword! With 100% working spec!
  • Flawless Pvp - Perfect switching 100% hybridding!
  • Crystal keys for our amazing Ckey Treasure box!
  • Unique new home! (Under Construction)
  • Great skilling areas!
  • All 24 skills working! - With our own unique dungeoneering!
  • Donator zone! - (Extreme Donator zone Coming soon)!
  • Amazing donator benefits
  • Barrows brothers on hills!
  • All minigames - Barrows/Dominion tower/Castle wars/Duel arena.
  • Funpk zone! - Clanwars! - Safe portal (White) Unsafe portal (Red)!
  • Highscores! Coming soon!

Server NPC:

*Nex
*All GWD
*Corp + Custom corporeal beast
*Bal’lak
*Slash bash
*Balanced elemental
*Mutant tarn
*Blink
*Zemouregal
*Ulfric
*Ice demon
*Ice Troll King
*General Khazard
*Jungle demon
*Merc mage
*Necro lord
*Sunfreet
*King Black Dragon
*Queen Black Dragon
*Tormented demons
*Jad - 1 Wave.
*Bork
*Kalphite Queen
*Nomad
*Troll Queen
*DKS - Dagannoth Kings
*Glacors
*Jadinkos
*Polypore
*Ganodermic Beasts
*Avatar Of Destruction
*Chaos Elemental
*Revs
*Giant Mole
*Kal’ger The Warmonger
*Glod
*Wildy Wyrm
*Ice strykewyrms
*World-Gorger
*Lucien
*Phoenix
*Do No Evil Bosses
*Enhanced Ice Titans
*Bouncer

*Lunar bosses:
The Inadequacy
The Everlasting
The Untouchable

Much more!

MEDIA:

  1. Some of our Customs
  2. Goliath gloves and Swift gloves + Specs, Miasmic spells
  3. Some shops


  4. Some Npc bosses. NOTE - There is lots more will upload them later!















  5. Working bank tabs.

    6.Home + Shopes, That home is only temporary.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/249954846/Extinction.jar
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/...Extinction.jar

Hope to see you ingame
